verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:1
verses.text: And Moses called all Israel, and said unto them, Hear, O Israel, the statutes and judgments which I speak in your ears this day, that ye may learn them, and keep, and do them.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:2
verses.text: The Lord our God made a covenant with us in Horeb.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:3
verses.text: The Lord made not this covenant with our fathers, but with us, even us, who are all of us here alive this day.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:4
verses.text: The Lord talked with you face to face in the mount out of the midst of the fire,
